DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial examines efficacy hands-on-healing fatigue immune function breast cancer survivor . Participants may randomize one three group : hands-on-healing , touch alone , control group .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Hands-on-Healing vs. Touch Fatigued Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: Please see website http : //healing.ucsd.edu detailed information study .
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal postmenopausal woman age 18 70 year . Ability give inform consent . Breast cancer survivor undergo surgery , include lumpectomy simple total mastectomy , follow chemotherapy combination chemo radiotherapy . We elect study survivor instead patient actively undergo treatment alleviate subject burden risk protocol . Stage I III breast cancer survivor . Breast cancer survivor finish chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy least one month prior 60 month prior . Breast cancer survivor abovenormative level fatigue . Breast cancer patient currently receive schedule receive radiation chemotherapy course intervention study . Patients current major depression , current history prior bipolar illness , currently psychotropic medication . Patients diseases known induce fatigue ( e.g. , thyroid disorder ; sleep disorder ) . Patients inflammatory disease affect cytokine level . Patients history cancer , stage IV breast cancer . Patients undergo current chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy . Men breast cancer . Substance abuse/dependence . Continued use another biofieldbased intervention ( e.g. , Reiki , QiGong , Healing Touch , Therapeutic Touch , Johrei ) .
